name: Save The Egg (KitKate)
description:
Hey friends this is my new small game where you have to save the egg from zombies

so to save the egg you have to use cannon, by pressing left click you can shoot zombies,by pressing A and D you can move right and left,And by pressing W and S you can move up and down.And also remeber that when zombie comes near to cannon you will be unable to shoot them,So you enjoy the game.
